tasks.label: Run
tasks.command: ulimit -s 1048576 && case ${file} in *.py) python3 ${file} < in && stickytape ${file} --add-python-path libpy > submit.py ;; *) ./a.out<in ;; esac

tasks.label: Run with time
tasks.command: ulimit -s 1048576 && /usr/bin/time -v ./a.out<in 2>&1 | grep -e User -e System -e Elap -e Max && ./a.out<in

tasks.label: RunAll
tasks.command: ulimit -s 1048576 && case ${file} in *.py) python3 ${file} < in && stickytape ${file} --add-python-path libpy > submit.py ;; *) ./testtc.sh ;; esac
